  • Uses of VariableResolver in com.sun.faces.el

    Subclasses of VariableResolver in com.sun.faces.el 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ChainAwareVariableResolver
    This special VariableResolver serves as the "original" VariableResolver that is passed to the one-arg ctor for the first custom VariableResolver that is encountered during application configuration.
    class  VariableResolverImpl
    Concrete implementation of VariableResolver.

    Deprecated.
    This has been replaced by Application.getELResolver().

    Methods in jakarta.faces.application with parameters of type VariableResolver 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void Application.setVariableResolver​(VariableResolver resolver)
    Deprecated.
    The recommended way to affect the execution of the Jakarta Expression Language is to provide an <el-resolver> element at the right place in the application configuration resources which will be considered in the normal course of expression evaluation.
    void ApplicationWrapper.setVariableResolver​(VariableResolver resolver)
    Deprecated.
    See superclass for alternative.
